Authors of Music Reference Books listed at this site

"Owners" = Who owns, or owned, this reference book (see the complete code list in library) The Dewey Decimal catalog number is noted for books which are in the Oshkosh (.C) or Appleton (.F) Wisconsin Public Libraries, as is the LC catalog number for UW Oshkosh (.I) books. Numbers preceded by "R -" are Reference only and cannot be obtained via inter-library loan. ISBN: none = According to the ISBN History page, International Standard Book Number (ISBN) numbers started being assigned to new books in the U.S. in 1970. Books published before then never had an ISBN number. Books published in Great Britain before 1967 never had a Standard Book Numbering (SBN) number.
